So grateful for books and stories that give us comfort, joy, escape and bring people together!  grateful for good people! Happy Thanksgiving! Happy 7 year publishing Anniversary to After We Collided! 🥰

Essa cena foi épica

After
After We Collided 
After We Fell
After Ever Happy
Before 
- Anna Todd ♥️ 

I thought I would post about these books today as the fourth film came to Prime Video today!

I won't turn this post into a books v movie post. I'll save it for... *Spoiler Alert* 

... when the fifth movie comes out!

For now I'll just talk about the books. They are so well written you can't help but feel the characters pain and struggles as deeply as they are feeling them themselves! 

There is so much depth to the feelings the protagonists having that you are really glued to the pages, turning and turning to pray they kiss and make up...
And let me tell you, these characters do a lot of making up! 

I could talk for hours about what I love about these books and then I talk on and on about the movies and what they did well and what they didn't.

But I for now I'll leave it here.

Tell me what you thought about these books / movies.

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 

#justabitbookish
#booksthatspeaktoyou #bookicantputdown #bookrecommendations #annatodd #afterbook #afterwecollidedbook #afterwefellbook #aftereverhappybook #beforebook #aftermovie #afterwecollidedmovie #afterwefellmovie #aftereverhappymovie #wattpad #bookworm #bookdragon #booklover #faviouritebooks

💫 After We Collided 💫

This series is so addicting to read. There is so much packed into each book! I felt like Tessa and Hardin did grow a little in this one and I’m excited to read what’s next. I still think I’ll have to read the whole series to fully decide how I feel about them but I really enjoyed this and gave it 5 ⭐️’s. 

🏷

❤️ 𝓗𝓮𝓵𝓵𝓸 𝓑𝓸𝓸𝓴𝓼𝓽𝓪 ❤️

« After we collided » de @annatodd aux éditions @hugonewromance 
Nombre de pages : 707

🗒Résumé en seconde photo🗒

♾Ce second tome m’a déçue je dois bien l’avouer… Je m’attendais à mieux… J’ai bien aimé mais moins que le premier de toute évidence. Il était long, il n’y avait pas tellement d’action, Tessa m’énervait toujours… Bref, un bon livre mais sans plus… 

♾Hardin, je l’aime vraiment beaucoup. Malgré tout le monde qui le trouve énervant, toxique, presque méchant… Je ne peux pas m’empêcher de l’adorer ! Oui il est toxique. Mais Tessa aussi ! Les deux ne devraient clairement pas être ensemble et c’est ce que j’aime le plus ! Ils ne sont pas fait l’un pour l’autre et j’adore ! 

♾J’ai traîné pour lire le premier tier puis le reste a été beaucoup plus fluide. Je l’ai lu en une petite semaine. J’ai aimé ma lecture et je lirais très certainement la suite mais j’ai moins hâte de lire le tome trois que j’avais hâte de lire le tome deux…

♾Oui, je le conseille quand même car j’ai apprécié ma lecture !

Note : ⭐️⭐️⭐️/5

Just as Tessa makes the biggest decision of her life, everything changes...
What is the difference between loving someone & being able to have them in your life?
Is the irrepressible heat between Tessa & Hardin worth all the drama?
Love used to be enough to hold them together. But if Tessa follows her heart now, will it be... the end?
The story continues...❤️❤️❤️

today @chance_perdomo published this photo (the first), as soon as I saw it I immediately noticed the blue bookcase behind it, and so I went to look for and understand where I had seen it, and thus found it: February 17, 2021 @largedrew shares photos of the house (you see from the third photo) writing "what a trip seeing my art in a movie" at first it seemed all normal, until many fans noticed a picture of Tessa on the wall and one on the desk, so there was a lot of talk about this thing and we fans understood that it was the apartment in (after ever happy), also because in the AWF trailer you see the Hessa room and you understand that it is very different from the photo, so I don't think it's AWF but by AEH.  So the photo Chance released today was taken on the set of AEH in the New York apartment;  I hope the information I gave you is correct❤️ ⚠️PLEASE SHARE⚠️❤️
